colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,(ZHES PA 'DI YANG SKU SKYE NGAG DBANG 'JAM DBYINGS MKHYEN BRTZE'I RGYA MTSO DANG BYANG 'DREN SNGAGS RAMS PA BLO BZANG RIN CHEN SOGS NYE 'KHOR BKA' RAM DU MAS AA RIG DPON TSE RING GZUNGS KYIS SA CHA NAS RMA CHEN SPOM RA MTHONG TE, BSANG MCHOD 'DI 'DRA @003B ZHES BSKUL TSE BLO BZANG MING CAN GYIS TSIGS BZHI BKRA SHIS GRAGS LDAN 'DI NYID 'PHRIN DU BRIS BYAS PA'I YIG GE PA NI RAB BYAMS SMRA BA 'JAM DBYANGS PHUN TSOGS GO RNA BSANGS BKRA SHIS GRAGS LDAN BZHUGS SO,, ,,)
